content:
FaultCallback Delegate

In this Article

Represents the method that is called when a scheduled activity or one of its children enters the ActivityInstanceState state.

Syntax

Declaration

public delegate void FaultCallback(NativeActivityFaultContext faultContext, Exception propagatedException, ActivityInstance propagatedFrom);

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Delegate
  • FaultCallback
